title: The Magic of animation
creator_contributor_role: Ontario Educational Communications Authority, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animators
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
description: A look at the people and techniques involved in the production of animated films. Includes interviews with animators from the United States, Canada, France, Holland, Poland and Yugoslavia intercut with excerpts of some of their works. Written and narrated by Rick Butler, Camera by Richard Stringer, edited by David Maltby, sound by John Uhtoff and title design by Vergo.
